text: Hey Frank, its really not that bad to code from scratch, If you need any help lemme know
Any guidance at all or resources that go through this in more detail? I found the knowledge base articles a little lacking in details
Inbound Labs has a Hero Video that is similar to what you were doing too Tyler: <https://app.HubSpot.com/marketplace/5014511/products/inboundlabs/hero-video-startup-framework>
